findings.Description: The IAM password policy should require minimum length, complexity, and rotation.
Types: Software and Configuration Checks/Industry and Regulatory Standards/AWS-Foundational-Security-Best-Practices
findings.Title: IAM password policy does not meet recommended configuration

findings.Description: Classic Load Balancers should have connection draining enabled.
Types: Software and Configuration Checks/Industry and Regulatory Standards/AWS-Foundational-Security-Best-Practices
findings.Title: Classic Load Balancer does not have connection draining enabled

findings.Description: VPC Flow Logs indicate systematic port scanning from instance attempting connections to multiple ports across subnet range.
findings.Title: Port scanning activity detected
